path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 396px; height: 1px; padding-top: 240px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 32px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.span: Automatic event detection from PLC layer or derived from OPC UA sensor data using condition functions.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 240px; margin-left: 1072px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 30px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: Enables correlation of downtime events with operational sensor data for predictive and root-cause analysis.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 456px; height: 1px; padding-top: 240px; margin-left: 510px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 30px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Structured storage in event_log linked to assets, locations, calendar, categories, problems, and causes.ation into other hydraulic systems.
